
for _ in range(int(raw_input())):
    n=input()
    l=list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
    for i in range(0,n-1):
        if i%2==0:
            if l[i]>l[i+1]:
                l[i],l[i+1]=l[i+1],l[i]
        else:
            if l[i]<l[i+1]:
                l[i],l[i+1]=l[i+1],l[i]
    for i in l:
        print i,
    print ''
